39 class ObjectDetector
40 {
41  public:
46  ObjectDetector(const std::string& clientname)
47  : client_(clientname, true) //action client
48  {
49  /*
50  * subscribers and publisher
51  */
52  depthS_ = n_.subscribe(Depth_Topic_, 0, &ObjectDetector::depthCallback, this);
53  rgbS_ = n_.subscribe(RGB_Topic_, 0, &ObjectDetector::rgbCallback, this);
54  cInfoS_ = n_.subscribe(Camera_Info_, 0, &ObjectDetector::cInfoCallback, this);
55  cupPublisher_ = n_.advertise<geometry_msgs::Point>(Cup_Position_, 1);
56 
57  //connection to action server
58  ROS_INFO("waiting for action server to start");
59  client_.waitForServer();
60  ROS_INFO("connected to action server");
61  }
62 
63  ~ObjectDetector()
64  {
65  }

74  return;

102  void sendGoal(const int id)
103  {
104  goal_.id = id;
105  goal_.image = rgbImg_;
106 
107  /*
108  * convert sensor_msgs::Image to opencv image
109  */
110  try
111  {
112  oldDepth_ = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(depthImg_, sensor_msgs::image_encodings::TYPE_32FC1);
113  std::cout << "depth type: " << oldDepth_->image.type() << std::endl;
114  }
115  catch (cv_bridge::Exception& e)
116  {
117  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge error: %s", e.what());
118  return;
119  }
120 
121  /*
122  * send goal function
123  * binds callback function
124  */
125  client_.sendGoal(goal_,
126  boost::bind(&ObjectDetector::detectorCallback, this, _1, _2),
127  Client_T_::SimpleActiveCallback(),
128  Client_T_::SimpleFeedbackCallback());
129  ROS_INFO("sent goal");
130 
131  return;
132  }
133 
139  void detectorCallback(const actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState& state,
140  const darknet_ros_msgs::CheckForObjectsResultConstPtr& result)
141  {
142  short m = 0;
143  for(const auto& bb : result->boundingBoxes.boundingBoxes)
144  {
145  /*
146  * reshape bounding box pixels into a 1D array for k-means
147  */
148  cv::Mat obj, labels, centers;
149  reshape(obj, oldDepth_, bb);
150 
151  /*
152  * K-Means clustering to find a decent depth estimate to the detected object
153  * probably not necessary with image_geometry
154  */
155  cv::kmeans(obj, 3, labels,
156  cv::TermCriteria(CV_TERMCRIT_ITER | CV_TERMCRIT_EPS, 10000, 0.001),
157  3, cv::KMEANS_PP_CENTERS, centers);
158 
159  float dist = 0.0; //distance/depth to cup
160 
161  /*
162  * depth image is imprecise
163  * 3 clusters increases assurance that the cup map is extracted correctly
164  * background/foreground/misreadings generally give darker/brigher values than the cup
165  */
166  dist = mean(centers.at<float>(0), centers.at<float>(1), centers.at<float>(2));
167 
168  /*
169  * publisher and info output
170  */
171  publishXYZ(bb, (double) dist);
172  ROS_INFO("#%d: %s; Prb: %3f, K: %3f", ++m, bb.Class.c_str(), bb.probability, dist);
173 
174  /*
175  * draw bounding boxes and info on depth image
176  * for debugging purposes, will be removed in the end i guess
177  */
178  draw(oldDepth_, bb, m);
179  }
180  /*
181  * displays depth image with bounding boxes
182  * for debugging purposes, will be removed in the end i guess
183  */
184  cv::imshow("depthwin", oldDepth_->image);
185  char wKey = cv::waitKey(1) & 0xFF;
186 
187  return;
188  }
189 
190  private:
191  /*
192  * Node
193  * Subscribers
194  * Publisher
195  */
196  ros::NodeHandle n_;
197  ros::Subscriber depthS_, rgbS_, cInfoS_;
198  ros::Publisher cupPublisher_;
199 
200 
201  /*
202  * Action client for darknet_ros object detector
203  */
204  Client_T_ client_;

206  /*
207  * message variables
208  * cupPos_: x, y, z position published on Cup_Position_ topic
209  * rgbImg_, depthImg_: image messages from orbbec astra camera
210  * goal_: rgbImg_ and id for object detector
211  * result_: resulting bounding boxes and probabilities from detector
212  */
213  geometry_msgs::Point cupPos_;
214  sensor_msgs::Image rgbImg_, depthImg_;
215  sensor_msgs::CameraInfo cameraInfo_;
216  darknet_ros_msgs::CheckForObjectsGoal goal_;
217  darknet_ros_msgs::CheckForObjectsResult result_;
218 
219  /*
220  * retention of depth image, stored every time a goal is sent to darknet_ros for detection
221  * in order to match the depth to the correlated rgb image
222  */
223  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr oldDepth_;
224 
227  template<typename T>
228  inline T mean(const T x, const T y, const T z)
229  {
230  if(((x < y) && (x > z)) || ((x < z) && (x > y))) return x;
231  else if(((y < x) && (y > z)) || ((y < z) && (y > x))) return y;
232  else if(((z < x) && (z > y)) || ((z < y) && (z > x))) return z;
233  //what are the odds of two exactly equal inputs right
234  else return (x + y + z) / (T) 3;
235  }
236 
241  void draw(cv_bridge::CvImagePtr& img_, const darknet_ros_msgs::BoundingBox& box_, int counter_)
242  {
243  std::ostringstream title;
244  title << std::setprecision(3) << "#" << counter_ << "; P: " << box_.probability;
245 
246  cv::rectangle(img_->image, cv::Point(box_.xmin, box_.ymin), cv::Point(box_.xmax, box_.ymin - 12), 1.0, -1);
247  cv::rectangle(img_->image, cv::Point(box_.xmin, box_.ymin), cv::Point(box_.xmax, box_.ymax), 1.0);
248  cv::putText(img_->image, title.str(), cv::Point(box_.xmin, box_.ymin), cv::FONT_HERSHEY_PLAIN, 1.0, 0.0, 2);
249 
250  return;
251  }
252 
255  void reshape(cv::Mat& obj_, const cv_bridge::CvImagePtr& img_, const darknet_ros_msgs::BoundingBox& box_)
256  {
257  obj_ = cv::Mat((box_.xmax - box_.xmin) * (box_.ymax - box_.ymin), 1, CV_32F);
258  for(int k = 0; k < (box_.xmax - box_.xmin); ++k)
259  {
260  for(int l = 0; l < (box_.ymax - box_.ymin); ++l)
261  {
262  float* cc = img_->image.ptr<float>(l + box_.ymin, k + box_.xmin);
263  obj_.at<float>(l + (k * (box_.ymax - box_.ymin)), 0) = (std::isnan(*cc)) ? 0.0 : *cc;
264  }
265  }
266 
267  return;
268  }
269 
272  void publishXYZ(const darknet_ros_msgs::BoundingBox& box_, double zd)
273  {
274  double xd = ((double) box_.xmin) + (((double) (box_.xmax - box_.xmin)) / 2);
275  double yd = ((double) box_.ymin) + (((double) (box_.ymax - box_.ymin)) / 2);
276  // x,y might be without the zd multiplication, unsure
277  // change for image_geometry
278  cupPos_.x = (xd - cameraInfo_.K[2] - cameraInfo_.P[3]) * zd / cameraInfo_.K[0];
279  cupPos_.y = (yd - cameraInfo_.K[5] - cameraInfo_.P[7]) * zd / cameraInfo_.K[4];
280  cupPos_.z = zd; //depth
281  cupPublisher_.publish(cupPos_);
282 
283  return;
284  }
285 };
